name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: Classic soup with fresh basil and cream.
ingredients:
Tomatoes
Onion
Garlic
Basil
Cream
Salt
Pepper
instructions: Saute onion/garlic, add tomatoes and basil, simmer, blend, finish with cream.

name: Lemon Herb Chicken
description: Pan-seared chicken with lemon butter sauce.
ingredients:
Chicken breast
Butter
Garlic
Lemon
Thyme
Salt
Pepper
instructions: Season chicken, sear in butter, add garlic/lemon/thyme, baste and rest.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic homemade cookies with chocolate chips.
ingredients:
Flour
Butter
Sugar
Brown Sugar
Eggs
Vanilla
Chocolate Chips
Baking Soda
Salt
instructions: Cream butter and sugars, add eggs and vanilla, mix in dry ingredients, fold in chocolate chips, bake at 350F for 10-12 mins.
